features.title: Key Features of GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js
features.description: Efficiently merge, split, and manipulate documents in PDF and Office formats using GroupDocs.Merger in a Node.js environment.

feature_1.title: Seamless Document Combination
feature_1.content: Easily merge multiple documents into one by combining specific pages or ranges from various files, using the GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js.

feature_2.title: Document Splitting Capabilities
feature_2.content: Split a single document into several smaller files for better management and organization, utilizing the comprehensive split feature of GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js.

feature_3.title: Efficient Page Movement
feature_3.content: Reposition pages within a document to suit your requirements by using the intuitive MovePage feature in the Node.js environment.

feature_4.title: Page Removal Options
feature_4.content: Remove unnecessary pages or specific page numbers easily with the GroupDocs.Merger's RemovePages feature tailored for Node.js.

feature_5.title: Page Rotation Functionality
feature_5.content: Rotate pages within a document to the desired orientation—90, 180, or 270 degrees—using the straightforward RotatePages operation.

feature_6.title: Page Swapping Feature
feature_6.content: Modify the order of your document's pages by swapping their positions, thus creating a reorganized document with the SwapPages function.

feature_7.title: Selective Page Extraction
feature_7.content: Create a new document from selected pages or page ranges, extracting only the necessary content with GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js.

feature_8.title: Orientation Alteration Tool
feature_8.content: Change the orientation of specific or all pages from portrait to landscape or vice versa, employing the ChangeOrientation feature in your Node.js projects.

feature_9.title: Document Page Previews
feature_9.content: Generate image previews of document pages to better understand their content and layout, using the PreviewPages feature within Node.js.
